r},weeklyCaloriesData:a=>(t=4)=>{const n=new Date,r=[];for(let s=t-1;s>=0;s--){const e=new Date(n.getTime()-(s*7+n.getDay())*24*60*60*1e3),o=new ${t-s}`,label:`${e.toLocaleDateString("en-US",{month:"short",day:"numeric"})} - ${o.toLocaleDateString("en-US",{month:"short",day:"numeric"})}`,calories:l})}return Date(e.getFullYear(),e.getMonth()+1,0),i=a.meals.filter(c=>{const m=new Date(c.meal_time);return m>=o&&m<=l}).reduce((c,m)=>c+m.calories,0);r.push({month:e.toLocaleDateString("en-US",{year:"numeric",month:"short"}),label:e.toLocaleDateString("en-US",{year:"numeric",month:"long"}),calories:i})}return r},averageDailyCalories:a=>(t=30)=>{const n=new Date,r=new Date(n.getTime()-t*24*60*60*1e3),s=a.meals.filter(e=>new Date(e.meal_time)>=r).reduce((e,o)=>e+o.calories,0);return this.syncMeals()}catch(a){console.error("Error loading meals:",a),this.error=a.message,this.meals=[]}finally{this.isLoading=!1}},async addMeal(a,t="",n=null){const r=D(),s=h(),e=n?new this.syncMeals()}catch(t){throw console.error("Error deleting meal:",t),this.error=t.message,t}},updateTodaysData(){const a=new Date().toDateString();this.todaysMeals=this.meals.filter(t=>new
